channel.title: I need help with 2 things
channel.description:
ok so the first think i need help with is editing the staff crowns
i want to change them but for the background i has to be this specific color
http://i719.photobucket.com/albums/ww193/JungleStory/PinkColor.png
how can i get that color???
also i need a client. if anyone can give me a link to an old style RSPS client i wud <3 u!

@deathschaos9 wrote:

[quote=“italy544, post:1, topic:343362”]ok so the first think i need help with is editing the staff crowns

i want to change them but for the background i has to be this specific color

how can i get that color???

also i need a client. if anyone can give me a link to an old style RSPS client i wud <3 u![/quote]
That color is Red: 255, Green: 0, Blue: 255.

If you need a client look in the download section.

Read full topic

item.title: I need help with 2 things
item.dc:creator: @eballer48 eballer48
item.description:
@eballer48 wrote:

You can only do these things if you have a client.
Do you have one? If not fine one that works with your source.
Okay so if you do find a folder name “Sprites” Most client have it named this,
however it may be named something different. Anyways…
For the chat background your going to wanna edit the
Chatback_0 again this might be named something different however
it should contain “chatback” edit this to change it…
Okay so then for your staff crowns locate the files named
“mod_icons 1” i’ve never seen a client with a different name but if
so it should contain mod or staff something like that…
There should be 2-4 of these each one is used for a different Player Rights.
Edit them for your own custom staff crown.
Hope i helped!
If you get stuck just PM me!
~Eballer48

Read full topic
